original_text: The Lord will let your enemies knock you down. You will attack them from one direction, but you will run away from them in seven directions. When the people of other nations see what has happened to you, they will see it is a terrible thing.
korean_text: 여호와께서 네 적군 앞에서 너를 패하게 하시리니 네가 그들을 치러 한 길로 나가서 그들 앞에서 일곱 길로 도망할 것이며 네가 또 땅의 모든 나라 중에 흩어지고

sentences.original_text: The Lord will let your enemies knock you down.
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 당신의 원수들이 당신을 치도록 내버려 두실 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: You will attack them from one direction,
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 한 방향에서 그들을 공격할 것이지만,

sentences.original_text: but you will run away from them in seven directions.
When the people of other nations see what has happened to you,
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 민족들이 당신에게 일어난 일을 볼 때,

sentences.original_text: they will see it is a terrible thing.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그것이 끔찍한 일임을 알게 될 것입니다.
